# How to Access and Edit Your Appdome User Profile

Last updated April 27, 2023 by Appdome

“My Profile” is the page where you can view and edit the details for your user account on Appdome. This Knowledge Base article provides an overview of how to access and edit your Appdome user profile

We hope you find this knowledge base useful and enjoy using Appdome!

## How to Access and Edit Your Appdome User Profile

### Accessing your Profile

1. Click on your username in the upper right corner of the screen to enter your personal area.
2. Click “My Profile”.

![](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Presentation4-1.png)

### Editing Your Profile

In the “My Profile” page, you have multiple options:

1. Edit your details. All fields marked with \* are required.
2. Choose an account icon.
3. Add a custom account icon.
4. Remove your account icon.
5. Here you can enable Appdome-GO™ and request access to the [Appdome](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/dev-sec-tools/app-sec-release-automation/automate-building-mobile-apps-appdome-rest-api/) [API](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/dev-sec-tools/app-sec-release-automation/automate-building-mobile-apps-appdome-rest-api/). After requesting access, our support will contact you with additional details.
6. Save your changes.

![](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Edit-Profile.png)

### After Receiving API Access

After you have access to the Appdome API, you can see the API token in your Profile page, under the “My Plan” section.

![](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Presentation4-2.png)

### How Do I Learn More?

Check out Appdome Settings (KB), [App](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/mobile-apps/no-code-app-shielding/use-checksum-validation-prevent-changes-mobile-apps/) [Validation](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/mobile-apps/no-code-app-shielding/use-checksum-validation-prevent-changes-mobile-apps/) or [request a demo](https://www.appdome.com/request-a-demo/) at any time.  
If you have any questions, please send them our way at [support@appdome.com](mailto:support@appdome.com) or via the chat window on the Appdome platform.  
To zoom out on this topic, visit [Appdome Platform](https://appdome.com/platform/) on our website.
